snippet: The production company behind films like "An Inconvenient Truth," "Food, Inc." and "Waiting for Superman" plans to combine the assets of two obscure channels, The Documentary Channel and Halogen TV.
abstract: The production company behind films like "An Inconvenient Truth," "Food, Inc." and "Waiting for Superman" plans to combine the assets of two obscure channels, The Documentary Channel and Halogen TV.

headline.main: Participant Media Plans New Cable Channel
headline.print_headline: A New Cable Channel Is in the Works
